headline: As Trump Digs In, A Look at Others Who Refused to Go
text: In Nancy Mitford’s comic 1960 novel “Don’t Tell Alfred,” the wife of the new British ambassador to Paris arrives at the embassy to find that she has a vexing problem: Her predecessor has refused to move out.
snippet: Wisdom from Shakespeare to Dickens to ‘Seinfeld’ on President Trump’s long non-goodbye.
